title: Highway 1
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway). Vehicle incident between Annis Rd and Exit 135 for 6.1 km (Chilliwack). Road closed. Detour in effect. Assessment in progress. Expect delays. Westbound detour: Exit 135 (Agassiz/Harrison Hot Springs) to Highway 9. Eastbound detour: Exit 129 (Annis Road) to Yale Road. Next update time Fri Nov 8 at 3:00 PM PST. Last updated Fri Nov 8 at 10:41 AM PST. (DBC-70096)
Location: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway) between Annis Rd and Exit 135 for 6.1 km (Chilliwack)
Description: Vehicle incident, road closed, detour in effect, assessment in progress, expect delays. Westbound detour: Exit 135 (Agassiz/Harrison Hot Springs) to Highway 9. Eastbound detour: Exit 129 (Annis Road) to Yale Road.

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Bridge construction at Nicomen River Rd (14 km east of Lytton). Until Sat Nov 30. Watch for traffic control. Expect delays. Speed reduced to 30 km/h. Highway stoppages with expected delays of 15 minutes. Project completion: 30 November 2024. Next update time Fri Nov 29 at 3:00 PM PDT. Last updated Fri Oct 25 at 5:08 AM PDT. (DBC-56391)
Location: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), Nicomen River Rd (14 km east of Lytton)
Description: Bridge construction with traffic control, speed reduced to 30 km/h, expect delays and highway stoppages with expected delays of 15 minutes.

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Construction work between Coburn St and Shuswap Ave for 0.7 km (Chase). From 7:00 AM to 5:00 PM PDT on weekdays and Saturday. Blasting. Road closed intermittently. Watch for traffic control. Speed reduction to 60km/hr. Next update time Mon Nov 25 at 10:00 AM PDT. Last updated Mon Oct 21 at 10:28 AM PDT. (DBC-64961)
Location: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), between Coburn St and Shuswap Ave for 0.7 km (Chase)
Description: Construction work with blasting, road closed intermittently, speed reduction to 60km/hr. Watch for traffic control.

title: Highway 1 Both Directions

title: Highway 1

title: Highway 101 Both Directions
description: Highway 101, in both directions. Special event planned between Alberni St and Duncan St for 0.9 km (Powell River). Starting Sun Dec 1 at 2:00 PM PDT until Sun Dec 1 at 5:00 PM PDT. title: Highway 17 Both Directions
description: Highway 17 (Patricia Bay Highway), in both directions. Construction work at Exit 18: Keating Cross Rd (Central Saanich). Until Tue Jul 1, 2025. Nighttime lane closures both directions. Access to Barbara Drive from Keating Cross Road and access to East Saanich, Martindale and Danica from Highway 17 permanently closed. Keating Cross Road southbound onramp to Highway 17 closed. Next update time Sat May 10, 2025 at 12:00 PM PDT. Last updated Thu Sep 26 at 12:08 PM PDT. (DBC-54341)
Location: Highway 17 (Patricia Bay Highway), Exit 18: Keating Cross Rd (Central Saanich)
Description: Construction work with nighttime lane closures in both directions. Access to Barbara Drive from Keating Cross Road and access to East Saanich, Martindale, and Danica from Highway 17 permanently closed. Keating Cross Road southbound onramp to Highway 17 closed.

title: Kootenay Lake Ferry
description: Kootenay Lake Ferry. Ferry is out of service between Balfour and Kootenay Bay. Schedule modification due to crewing issue. Monday - Friday Essential Service sailings from Balfour at 6:30AM, 8:10AM, 4:30PM, from Kootenay Bay at 7:10AM, 9AM, 5:20PM. Passage only for Essential Service travelers. All weekend and holiday sailings cancelled. Emergency service sailings accommodated. Next update time Tue Nov 12 at 9:00 AM PST. Last updated Fri Nov 8 at 12:27 PM PST. (DBC-69872)
Location: Kootenay Lake Ferry, between Balfour and Kootenay Bay
Description: Ferry is out of service due to crewing issue. Modified schedule with Essential Service sailings on weekdays. Passage only for Essential Service travelers. Weekend and holiday sailings cancelled. Emergency service sailings accommodated.

title: Other Roads
description: Johnston Bridge. Travel advisory in effect at Front St. In Quesnel. Johnston Bridge. Bridge is open to vehicles with gross vehicle weight rating of 10,000 kilograms or lower. Industrial traffic and heavy commercial traffic must detour via Plywood Rd and Maple Drive. Industrial traffic is not allowed to detour through Johnston Subdivision. Next update time Wed Apr 8, 2026 at 9:00 AM PDT. Last updated Thu Oct 17 at 6:39 AM PDT. (DBC-47311)
Location: Johnston Bridge, Front St. in Quesnel
Description: Travel advisory in effect. Bridge open to vehicles with gross vehicle weight rating of 10,000 kilograms or lower. Industrial traffic and heavy commercial traffic must detour via Plywood Rd and Maple Drive. Industrial traffic not allowed to detour through Johnston Subdivision.
